import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import firebase from 'firebase/app'; export class EditProfile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = {}; } componentDidMount() { this.setState({ profile: this.props.state.profile }) console.log(this.state) } handleEditProfile = () => { let userEmail = firebase.auth().currentUser.email.replace(/[^a-zA-Z0-9]/g, ""); let updateProfile = { name: this.state.profile.name, email: this.state.profile.email, phone: this.state.profile.phone, major: this.state.profile.major, grade: this.state.profile.grade, address: this.state.profile.address } let updates= {}; updates[userEmail+'/profile/'] = updateProfile; return firebase.database().ref().update(updates); } render() { return (
